ADAMS CREEK ASSOCIATES
v.
DAVIS, et al. 3A08-4 Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 20, 2018 L. Lamar Armstrong, Jr., Attorney at Law, Smithfield, for Adams Creek Associates. James E. Hairston, Jr., Attorney at Law, Durham, for Davis, Melvin, et al. William G. Simpson, Jr., Attorney at Law, Chapel Hill, C. Frank Goldsmith, Jr., Attorney at Law, Marion, for N.C. Advocates for Justice.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 18th of April 2018 by North Carolina Advocates for Justice for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of April 2018."

Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i).
